Question
========

The *standard error* of a *sample mean* becomes

Answerlist
----------

* Reater as the sample size increases.
* Smaller when the sample size increases.
* Not affected by sample size.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Larger when the sample size increases: Incorrect
* Smaller when the sample size increases: Correct
* Unaffected by sample size..: Incorrect
